name: Jafar Tanwir
story: Sibhatullah Amani was born and raised in Afghanistan. He joined the Taliban as a young man and fought against coalition forces for many years. After the fall of the Taliban, Sibhatullah joined other insurgent groups in the region, including the Iranian-backed OPFOR. He has been with OPFOR for several years now, rising through the ranks to his current position as an assistant autorifleman. Despite his years of fighting, Sibhatullah is known for his calm and collected demeanor, and for his dedication to the cause. He is married and has three children.
